  • Exporting a wide range of Dried sea food items.

    The products offered by us are processed and manufactured in our own plant with sophisticated infrastructure and well-equipped with various machines under the supervion of technically qualified persons.

  • Products

    • Dried Sea Prawns


      Prawns are a rich source of selenium, one of the most effective antioxidants at maintaining healthy cells. They also contain high levels of Zinc, which is important to develop a healthy immune system. Eating prawns helps build strong bones because they contain phosphorous, copper and magnesium

    • Ayala Dried Fish

      Ayala Fish or Karuvadu has odors when you are frying or cook it, but its taste is very good or even better when we have it with Rice/Pakhala (Rice with water) typically Oriya dish. Dried Fish Ayala contains a high percentage of proteins, and omega 3, fatty acids minerals, and vitamins, for a healthy body and mind. Dry Fish are commonly cooked in Indian kitchens.

    • Dried Salty Sea Fish

      Dry Fish are commonly cooked in Indian kitchens. It has strong odours when you are frying/cook it, but its taste is very good or even better when we have it with Pakhala (Rice with water) typically Oriya dish. Dried fish/Sukhua contains high percentage of proteins, and omega 3, fatty acids minerals, and vitamins, for healthy body and mind.
